message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product for me is quite a bit higher. How about we settle at $17,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stick to my budget. I can do $13,000, is that something you'd be willing to consider?
